title: Font used in a icon
content:
Does anyone know what font this is? (or something similar).  
Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090930101947/http:/typophile.com/files/font_21.png) | 567 bytes |
author: David Ford

comments.content:
Here are some that will get you close but without seeing additional letters itâ€™s tough.

[Boton-Bold Italic BE](http://web.archive.org/web/20090930101947/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/boton-be/) (Or Boton BQ)  
 [Italia](http://web.archive.org/web/20090930101947/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/italia/) (With fake skew)  
 [Rockwell-Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090930101947/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/rockwell/)
